name: Hackshot (MhmdSubhi)
description:
/* Hack Data, Breach Security and Destroy the viruses of other Hackers, WITH STYLE. Change the rules of the game using Hacks, in an Open-ended designed Puzzles */

The game is currently in development, and the current Web version available is  Alpha 4.10.

If you like the game, consider wishlisting the game on Steam, and if you wish to help the developer, your feedback is invaluable.

Get More => Steam Page && Game's Discord

Thank you very much,
Mhmd 5ubh!
